sense.def:
Novelty
je lastnost tistega, kar je drugačno, novo in nenavadno.

seg.quote: He became interested because of the novelty of the problem.

sense.def:
A novelty
je nekaj, kar je novo in zato zanimivo.

seg.quote: The car was still a novelty at that time.

sense.def:
Novelties
so ceneni nenavadni predmeti, ki jih prodajajo kot darila ali spominke.
